title: How to reset your password
content: Open the app, go to Sign In, tap 'Forgot Password', enter your email, and follow the OTP instructions.

title: Refund policy
content: Duplicate charges are refunded within 5-7 business days after verification.

title: Report an outage
content: Check the status page; if outage persists, restart router and contact support with your account number.

title: Cancel subscription
content: Submit a cancellation request from My Account > Subscriptions. Equipment must be returned within 14 days.
